participant_1.background:
I have a lot of interests that I like to spend time on, and I sometimes have trouble keeping up with my family.
my dad works at the mill and my mom is a teacher.
I'm not sure what my weight is because I don't have a scale, but I'm pretty sure I'm getting bigger.
i like tall men.
I enjoy wearing comfortable, stylish clothing that is made from sustainable materials.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy spending time with my grandparents and hearing about their stories.
I like to go to car shows and corvette forums online to learn more about my car and see what other people are doing with theirs.
i believe that mermaids are real.
I'm an excellent caretaker for my pets.
I have a pet dog who is always happy to see me, no matter how bad my day was.

content.text: Hey there!
Hi there, how's your day going?
It's going well! Just hanging out and getting ready for work tomorrow.
That's good to hear! What do you do for work?
I'm a teacher at a local elementary school.
Oh cool! I've always thought about being a teacher.
It's a lot of fun! But it can be challenging too.
I'm sure it is! What's your favorite thing about being a teacher?
I love getting to work with kids and help them learn.
That's so sweet! I'm sure you're a great teacher.
Thanks! I try my best!
I'm sure you do! What do you like to do for fun outside of work?
I like to spend time with my family and friends, go out to eat, and read.
That sounds like a lot of fun! What's your favorite book?
I'm not sure I have a favorite book, but I really like the Harry Potter series.
Oh, I love those books! I've read them all multiple times.
Me too! They're so good.
I'm glad you like them! What's your favorite thing about them?
I love the characters and the story. It's so magical and exciting.
I agree! They're really well written
